items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: This dress is everything for us curvy girls! Fabric is to die for and not sweat inducing. The color. THE COLOR is so rich! The picture doesnt do the saturation justice at all. Lightweight but clearly made well. This is my go to dress for anything fancy and just in time for the holidays. Do it! Read more
items.author: heather ingram

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice!
items.body: I ordered a 2X and it fit very large. I could’ve gone down a size overall, the dress was beautiful and I wish it would’ve fit. Read more
items.author: Jazzy85

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good buy
items.body: I ordered a XL per recommendation, but definitely could have sized down to a L. I say that because I could put it on over my head without it being unzipped even with me having a large bustline . The overall length, comfort, style and compliments still made me enjoy wearing this dress. Read more
items.author: Toni

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Broken zipper
items.author: Catherine W. huge Cathy Lamb f

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GORGEOUS
items.body: SUPER PRETTY it was a bit big so im going to size down and see how it goes, ill post a photo when the new one comes in! looks as pictured, and the quality is nice for the price! Read more
items.author: mary m.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product
items.body: I got this dress for a Yule ball. It was absolutely perfect. I got so many compliments. The dress was comfortable, the material was nice and soft. It was a great fit! Read more
items.author: Onna Delahunt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: Beautiful dress but runs big. Read more
items.author: jose duarte

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Returned it
items.body: Had to return it. The excess material in the front was unflattering. It made me look wider. Pretty dress, but only if there was less material on that top layer. Read more
items.author: RCM

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: #1 Dark Green, #1 Hidden Blue, #1 Wine Red, #1 Olive Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
